plot: Unemployed daydreamer, Vijay Kumar (Sanjay Kapoor) has one goal in his life, which is to marry his dream-girl. His dad (Kulbhushand Kharbanda) has other plans, to get him married to Vandana...
title: Mere Sapno Ki Rani
